pahugiya kalaye wagema danatath wiwidha wruththikayan , rakiya apekshitha tharuna tharuniyan rawatamin , kanadawe sthira padinchiya saha sthira rakiya laba dena bawata porondu demin wiwidha aayathana saha pudgalayan deshana pawathwamin , rupawahini danwim palakaramin , puwath path danwim damamin ( piligath yayi nam sandahan , web adawi lipina sandahan saha thaman deratema nithi kshethrey prawinayan yayi hangawamin ) rapiyal laksha ganan mudal ras karaganna bawa , danatamath ras karagena athi bawath dana gannata labuna , wisheshayenma kolambain aatha predsha wala rohal wala , karya mandalaye samahara samajikawan danatamath ema sura kam walata asuwi athi bawa dana gannata labuna , ee gana kiwa yuthuma de , kisiwakutawath , kisiwakuge nila namayatawath kanadawa thula sthira padinchiya laba dimata , sthira rakiya laba dimata kanada rajaya wetha bala kirime hakiyawak naha , eya swadhiwa kriyathmaka wana lakunu dime kriyapatipatiyaka kotasak witharayi.

wartha wana  marana sankhyawa laksha 5kata adhikayi.korona ganayata ayath nawa wairasayak chinaye wuhan nagarayen handunaganune pasugiya wasare desambar masayeyi.eya goliya wasangathayak  bawata path wi lowapura wyaptha wimath samanga wairasaya kowid 19 lesa nam kirimata loka saukhya sanwidhanaya piyawara gaththa.wairasaye wyapthiya arambai chinaya me wana wita kowid 19 sarthakawa palanayata samathwa athi athara gatha wu paya 24 thula eratin wartha wuye nawa aasadithayan 21k pamanayi.kowid 19 wasangathaya me wana wita lowapura wyaptha wi masa 07k pamana gatha wana athara eeta goduru aasadithayan sankhyawa 10,108,738k.me wana wita dinak thula wartha wana kowid 19 aasadithayan sankhyawada salakiya yuthu wardhanayak pennumkarana athara gatha wu paya 24 thula lowapura nawa aasadithayan 176,568k wartha wuna.lowapura wartha wana aasadithayan athurin 5,480,877k me wana wita suwaya laba thibenawa.lowapura wartha wana kowid 19 marana sankhyawa 501,868k.me athara  wairasaye wyapthiya arambai chinaya menma dakunu koriyawa wani ratawal me wana wita kowid 19 dewana rallaka awadanamakatada muhunadi sitinawa.wadima aasadithayan wartha wana amerikawen gatha wu paya 24 thula nawa aasadithayan 43,581k wartha wu athara erata samastha aasadithayan sankhyawa 2,596,771 k dakwa ihalagiya.me hethuwen janadhipathi donald trampge teksashi mathiwarana pracharaka rali nawatha damimatada piyawara gena thibenawa.
